newsitem.title: USA: Arcadia Financial senior note rating cut.
newsitem.headline: Arcadia Financial senior note rating cut.

text.p: Duff & Phelps Credit Rating Co said Monday it cut its rating on Arcadia Financial Ltd's $300 million of senior notes to single-B-plus from double-B-minus.
Duff & Phelps said its concerns were geared toward the non-prime auto financing industry, more than toward circumstances at Arcadia, which had been known as Olympic Financial Ltd.

Duff and Phelps said that declining liquidity in the capital markets, continued heavy competition in pricing and terms, and declining recovery rates, as used-car pricing has begun to deteriorate, could put the prevailing business model in the non prime auto business under pressure.
